title: Salman Khan, Ranbir Kapoor, Akshay Kumar, Vicky Kaushal and more celebs attend RSS centenary event in Mumbai. See pics
desc: Several Bollywood stars were spotted at a grand event in Mumbai to mark the centenary celebrations of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS). | Bollywood

title: From a massive living room to lavish bedrooms: A look at Samay Raina’s luxurious house
desc: Samay Raina, who is loved and known for his comic timing, recently shared a house tour. He appeared in a YouTube video with Archana Puran Singh’s son, Aaryamann Sethi, where he gave a glimpse into his home. The house has a chill zone, streaming room, dining area, and much more. title: SBI, PNB, Bank of Baroda: PSU banks' profit to cross ₹2 lakh crore milestone in FY26, says DFS Secretary Nagaraju
desc: SBI share price: "As I said, banks are the bellwether for the strength of the economy. Therefore, they are resilient. We have very prudent management systems in place under the regulator, the RBI. So we are not much worried about the external factors negatively impacting our banking sector," Nagaraju told PTI in an interview.

title: Pakistan boycott: PCB and ICC officials meet in Lahore
desc: Officials from the ICC and the PCB will meet in Lahore on Sunday for talks over Pakistan's planned boycott of their T20 World Cup match against India.

title: Japan’s Takaichi set for landslide election win, exit poll shows
desc: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's ruling coalition is set for a landslide victory, exit polls showed, a move that may accelerate a defense build-up aimed at countering China.

title: Osotsi slams President Ruto over alleged interference in ODM affairs
desc: Vihiga Senator Godfrey Osotsi has warned that the ODM risks implosion if internal disputes are not addressed through structured consultations and respect for party democracy.
